argument.name: layout_name
argument.description: The name of a form, browse, label, letter, or report layout.

page.description: Deletes a Form, Browse, Label, Letter, or Report Layout
page.discussion: LAYOUT_DELETE() deletes the named layout. The function displays an error message if there is no layout of the specified name and type, or if either field has a NULL value. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
